statements: SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damaged%';
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE product_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT * FROM returned_products ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM returned_products ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason = 'Defective' ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, return_reason, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE product_id > 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE return_date < '2022-05-15' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM products WHERE return_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_id, product_name, return_date FROM products ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM products JOIN product_returns ON products.product_id = product_returns.product_id WHERE returned_quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, return_date, return_reason FROM products WHERE return_date <= '2022-02-28' AND product_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM product_returns WHERE returned_quantity = 0);
SELECT product_name, return_date, return_reason FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' OR product_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT AVG(returned_quantity) AS avg_quantity, COUNT(*) AS total_returns FROM product_returns GROUP BY return_date ORDER BY return_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM returned_products ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT pattern_name AS Name, pattern_category AS Category FROM return_patterns WHERE pattern_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT trend_name FROM return_trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%popular%';
SELECT id, product_name FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, return_reason, return_date FROM returned_products ORDER BY return_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM return_trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_category FROM return_patterns WHERE pattern_category = 'electronics'
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_returns FROM returned_products
SELECT id, product_name, return_reason, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM returned_products;
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, return_reason, analysis_notes FROM customers JOIN returns_analysis ON customers.id = returns_analysis.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM returned_products;
SELECT id, product_name, return_date FROM returned_products ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';

SELECT customer_name, email, product_name, category FROM customers JOIN returns_analysis ON customers.id = returns_analysis.customer_id JOIN products ON returns_analysis.return_id = products.id ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Returns;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM Products;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM Customers;
SELECT return_id, product_id, quantity, return_reason FROM ReturnsDetails;
SELECT report_id, report_title, generated_by FROM Reports;
SELECT * FROM Returns;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM Customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';

SELECT r.return_date, r.reason, p.product_name, rd.quantity FROM Returns r JOIN ReturnsDetails rd ON r.return_id = rd.return_id JOIN Products p ON rd.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.customer_id = 123;

SELECT r.return_id, r.return_date, c.customer_name, r.reason, p.product_name, rd.quantity FROM Returns r JOIN ReturnsDetails rd ON r.return_id = rd.return_id JOIN Products p ON rd.product_id = p.product_id JOIN Customers c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY r.return_date DESC;
